title: Font similar to routed wooden sign
content:
Hi,

Trying to find a font close to this sample. Only reference os a photo of the original routed wood sign.  
Any help is greatly appreciated.

Thanks everyone!

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20140804222921im_/http:/typophile.com/files/BRIDGE%20TEXT_6013.jpg)
author: FBecht
